It triggered a large tsunami. Coastal areas faced evacuation. Submerged buildings and massive water drenching were seen. The quake's magnitude was 8.7. Tsunami waves reached up to 4 meters. Warnings issued for Japan, Hawaii, and other Pacific regions. People were asked to leave their homes. The earthquake was the strongest in decades.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/watch-tsunami-hits-russias-kamchatka-coast-after-8-7-earthquake-waves-up-to-4-metres-recorded/articleshow/122986495.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/watch-tsunami-hits-russias-kamchatka-coast-after-8-7-earthquake-waves-up-to-4-metres-recorded/articleshow/122986495.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 07:31:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3434914" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122988887,imgsize-3434914.cms"/></item><item><title>Bus carrying ITBP personnel falls into Sindh river in J&K; weapons missing</title><description><![CDATA[In Jammu and Kashmir's Ganderbal district, a bus carrying Indo-Tibetan Border Police (ITBP) personnel plunged into the Sindh River at Kullan amidst heavy rainfall on Wednesday. The vehicle veered off the Kullan bridge, prompting immediate response from SDRF teams. Rescue operations are underway.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jammu/jammu-and-kashmir-accident-bus-carrying-itbp-personnel-falls-into-sindh-river-rescue-operation-underway/articleshow/122988595.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jammu/jammu-and-kashmir-accident-bus-carrying-itbp-personnel-falls-into-sindh-river-rescue-operation-underway/articleshow/122988595.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 09:55:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51324" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122988697,imgsize-51324.cms"/></item><item><title>Op Shivshakti: 2 terrorists killed in J&K's Poonch; weapons cache recovered</title><description><![CDATA[An encounter initiated in Jammu and Kashmir's Poonch sector on Wednesday after security forces intercepted a group of terrorists attempting to infiltrate from across the border. Army officials reported that gunfire was exchanged, and two terrorists were hit. The operation is currently underway as troops investigate the area.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-encounter-security-forces-notice-individuals-trying-to-infiltrate-into-indian-side-in-poonch-two-fall-down-after-being-hit/articleshow/122987743.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-encounter-security-forces-notice-individuals-trying-to-infiltrate-into-indian-side-in-poonch-two-fall-down-after-being-hit/articleshow/122987743.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 09:01:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1059676" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122987784,imgsize-1059676.cms"/></item><item><title>'I'm against IND vs PAK, PM Modi saying Op Sindoor is on pause’: Ex-India cricketer</title><description><![CDATA[Manoj Tiwary, former Indian cricketer, strongly opposes the India-Pakistan Asia Cup 2025 match, citing recent terror attacks and military operations. While condemning terrorism, Sourav Ganguly offered a contrasting view, emphasizing that sport should continue.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/im-against-india-vs-pakistan-pm-modi-saying-operation-sindoor-is-on-ex-india-cricketer-slams-asia-cup-2025-fixture/articleshow/122988435.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/im-against-india-vs-pakistan-pm-modi-saying-operation-sindoor-is-on-ex-india-cricketer-slams-asia-cup-2025-fixture/articleshow/122988435.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 09:54:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="165322" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122988471,imgsize-165322.cms"/></item><item><title>Nayara Energy sues Microsoft alleging abrupt service suspension ‘without prior notice’</title><description><![CDATA[Nayara Energy, an Indian refiner with Russian backing, has initiated legal proceedings against Microsoft after the tech giant abruptly cut off access to essential services. Steyn and Shamsi debated the spirit of the game. A fan accused Steyn of double standards. The final Test begins July 31 amid ongoing tension.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-play-only-continued-for-some-personal-gain-dale-steyn-on-india-refusing-to-ben-stokes-draw-offer/articleshow/122987706.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-play-only-continued-for-some-personal-gain-dale-steyn-on-india-refusing-to-ben-stokes-draw-offer/articleshow/122987706.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 09:29:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="122114" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122987720,imgsize-122114.cms"/></item><item><title>Gold price prediction today: Where is gold rate headed in the near-term?</title><description><![CDATA[Gold price prediction today: Gold rates are poised for a limited upside due to emerging clarity on US trade policies. Kelce became a celebrity beyond sports. Their relationship transformed football into a cultural phenomenon.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/how-taylor-swift-hijacked-the-nfl-spotlight-and-turned-travis-kelce-into-a-billion-dollar-brand/articleshow/122966540.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/how-taylor-swift-hijacked-the-nfl-spotlight-and-turned-travis-kelce-into-a-billion-dollar-brand/articleshow/122966540.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 04:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37112" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122984881,imgsize-37112.cms"/></item><item><title>Indian national among two killed in small plane crash in Canada</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/indian-national-gautam-santhosh-among-two-killed-in-small-plane-crash-in-canada-consulate-offers-support-cause-under-probe/articleshow/122982547.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/indian-national-gautam-santhosh-among-two-killed-in-small-plane-crash-in-canada-consulate-offers-support-cause-under-probe/articleshow/122982547.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 00:14:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="593314" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122982594,imgsize-593314.cms"/></item><item><title>'Country will be shocked': Why PM Modi slammed Nehru's Indus Waters treaty - 'facts kept hidden'</title><description><![CDATA[PM Modi criticized the Indus Waters Treaty, highlighting a clause where Nehru allegedly conceded to Pakistan's demands, preventing India from desilting dams and even welding shut a gate on one. Modi claimed this decision, which Nehru later regretted, deprived Indian farmers of water and electricity, benefiting Pakistan at India's expense. India has since suspended the treaty and initiated desilting efforts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/indus-waters-treaty-inked-by-nehru-bars-india-from-desilting-dams-pm-modi/articleshow/122983420.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/indus-waters-treaty-inked-by-nehru-bars-india-from-desilting-dams-pm-modi/articleshow/122983420.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 01:31:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1698825" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122983424,imgsize-1698825.cms"/></item><item><title>'India good friend but ... ': Trump hints at 20-25% tariff rate</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump indicated a potential 20-25% tariff on Indian goods, slightly less than the previously announced 26%, amidst ongoing trade negotiations. He stated India's high tariffs prompted the consideration, despite acknowledging their friendship. This levy positions India competitively with Bangladesh in textiles, but behind Vietnam and Indonesia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trumps-latest-may-slap-india-with-20-25-tariff/articleshow/122984035.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trumps-latest-may-slap-india-with-20-25-tariff/articleshow/122984035.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 03:52:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36480" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122984067,imgsize-36480.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Significant positive impact’: Australia to ban children from YouTube</title><description><![CDATA[Australia is set to ban children under 16 from creating YouTube accounts starting in December, reversing its earlier stance. This decision follows concerns raised by the internet regulator and a survey revealing harmful content encountered by minors on the platform.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/significant-positive-impact-australia-to-ban-children-from-youtube-how-will-the-govt-restrict-underage-accounts/articleshow/122987348.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/significant-positive-impact-australia-to-ban-children-from-youtube-how-will-the-govt-restrict-underage-accounts/articleshow/122987348.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 08:35:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="605518" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122987424,imgsize-605518.cms"/></item><item><title>Top stocks to buy today: Stock recommendations for July 30 - check list</title><description><![CDATA[Stock market recommendations: Anand Rathi Shares and Stock Brokers recommends buying Mazagon Dock, Vascon Engineers, and Thermax. Matt Short returns, and Mitch Owen earns his first call-up. Mitchell Marsh will captain the ODI side in Pat Cummins's absence. Travis Head and Josh Hazlewood are back. Select players have been dropped from the previous West Indies series. An investigation is underway regarding the incident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/asked-to-prove-citizenship-by-pune-police-mob-kargil-veterans-family/articleshow/122984344.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/asked-to-prove-citizenship-by-pune-police-mob-kargil-veterans-family/articleshow/122984344.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 04:19:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ALIM SHAIKH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39900" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122984384,imgsize-39900.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar polls: SC 'overseeing' EC's SIR; to 'step in if there's mass exclusion'</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has permitted the Election Commission to release Bihar's draft voter list on August 1, following a special intensive revision. Initial reports indicate no major damage.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/earthquake-of-magnitude-8-8-strikes-russian-coast-tsunami-alert-issued-in-pacific-usgs/articleshow/122985223.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/earthquake-of-magnitude-8-8-strikes-russian-coast-tsunami-alert-issued-in-pacific-usgs/articleshow/122985223.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 05:32:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="16316" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122986853,imgsize-16316.cms"/></item><item><title>'He is now titled as justice': Judicial officer quits over 'harasser's' promotion</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/woman-judicial-officer-quits-over-harassers-promotion/articleshow/122985027.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/woman-judicial-officer-quits-over-harassers-promotion/articleshow/122985027.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 05:12:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY.MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32544" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122985240,imgsize-32544.cms"/></item><item><title>Russian, Japan coasts hit with Tsunami waves after powerful earthquake</title><description><![CDATA[A powerful magnitude 8.7 earthquake struck Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula, triggering tsunami waves up to 4 meters high.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/samsungs-big-tesla-order-fuels-recovery-bets-despite-chip-woes-19645636.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The Tesla deal is significant as it marks a shift for the ailing foundry business — from relying on captive internal orders to deeper external engagements, Citigroup analysts said in a report.       <title><![CDATA[Starbucks sales miss points to slow turnaround under new CEO Niccol]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/starbucks-sales-miss-points-to-slow-turnaround-under-new-ceo-niccol-19645617.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Starbucks is trying to stage a comeback after an uncharacteristic streak of same-store sales declines over the past year and a half. Chief Executive Officer Brian Niccol, who took the helm in September, is betting he can give the US business a jolt by cutting down wait times, revamping the menu and remodelling stores to bring back seating.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[SuperK to use ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen presence in small-town India]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>

      <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week.
